addr: 11812 San Vicente Blvd Suite 100 Los Angeles, CA 90049
title: Free Guest Pass to Audit a Real Estate Class
desc: Have you ever wondered what it would be like to be a real estate agent? Do you know what it takes to get your license in California? ADHI Schools has been providing the tools for students to reach their goals for over 10 years and now is your chance to come audit a class to see if this is the right fit for you . Our program is combined with optional live and online components giving students the flexibility to study in class and in the comfort of their own home. Our online videos and quizzes ensure that students will be prepared for the final exams after spending 45 hours with the materials and our instructors have first hand experience in real estate.? Come hang out with us and see how we can get you started. You can join us as our guest ANY Friday morning! Visit us online or give us a call.? 888.768.5285 www.adhischools.com www.crashcourseonline.com
